actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the National Endowment for the Humanities for national capital arts and cultural affairs (rescission numbered R87-72) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities
National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities

summary.text: Rescinds budget authority in a specified amount for the National Endowment for the Humanities for national capital arts and cultural affairs (R87-72).

titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the National Endowment for the Humanities for national capital arts and cultural affairs (rescission numbered R87-72) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
